title: Lärare inom app - och webbutveckling till LBS - Kreativa Gymnasiet
description:
LBS Kreativa gymnasiet är en stabil verksamhet som funnits i 30 år. Vi är en skola i framkant med nära kontakt med näringslivet. Vårt jobb är att lotsa eleverna genom gymnasietiden och under den resan förbereda dem inför framtidens kreativa branscher. Vår idé är "dagens utbildning för morgondagens jobb". Läs mer om oss på [www.lbs.se] (http://www.lbs.se) .*LBS – Kreativa gymnasiet i* ***Halmstad*** *startades* ***2002*** *och erbjuder högskoleförberedande utbildningar inom Teknikprogrammet och Estetiska programmet med följande inriktningar:* ***Arkitektur****,* ***Spelutveckling****,* ***App – och webbutveckling, Grafisk design och Spelgrafik****. Skolan har cirka* ***120*** *elever och* ***17*** *medarbetare. Skolan befinner sig i helt nya lokaler på Högskolan i Halmstads Campusområde.*


### **Lärare inom app - och webbutveckling till LBS Kreativa Gymnasiet i Halmstad**


#### **Ditt uppdrag**



Vi erbjuder en deltidstjänst inom webbrelaterade ämnen och letar efter just dig som har ett brinnande intresse för detta och som vill vara med och utveckla framtidens app - och webbutvecklare. Är du passionerad i UX, webb och applikationer, då vill vi ha dig i vårt team!



Det pedagogiska arbetet omfattar allt från planering, utformning och genomförande av undervisningen till utveckling av utbildningen.



De kurser som du kommer att undervisa i är **Dator - och nätverksteknik och Webbserverprogrammering.**



Vi strävar hela tiden efter att vara en utbildning i framkant och där blir du en nyckelspelare i att ge eleverna de rätta förutsättningarna för att lyckas i branschen.


#### **Din profil**



Vi söker dig som utöver din skarpa ämneskompetens vill bidra med engagemang, humor och prestigelöshet till våra skolor. Du är kreativ i din planering och genomförande av din undervisning, du skapar lust att lära och har förmågan att se eleverna som individer med olika behov och drivkrafter. I klassrummet är du en trygg ledare och du är bra på att skapa goda relationer.


#### **Vi erbjuder**



På våra skolor kombinerar vi ett välutvecklat systematiskt kvalitetsarbete med kreativa lärprocesser. Det ställer höga krav på alla som arbetar hos oss, på lärmiljön och på organisationen men ger också väldigt mycket tillbaka till dig som medarbetare genom stora möjligheter att i en stimulerande arbetsmiljö utvecklas i din profession och att arbeta med kollegialt lärande på riktigt.



Vi erbjuder våra medarbetare kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling genom Academedia Academy samt intern och extern professionsutveckling. Hos oss får du självklart kollektivavtalade förmåner och försäkringar men även friskvårdsbidrag, pensionsrådgivning och möjlighet till fördelaktiga köp genom netto- och bruttolöneväxling.


#### **Övrigt**



Tillträde 7 januari 2025.



Du är varmt välkommen med din ansökan via vårt rekryteringssystem senast den 241220. Tillsättning kan komma att ske innan sista ansökningsdag. Vid frågor kring tjänsten, kontakta gärna rektor Linda Ekstrand på mail linda.ekstrand@lbs.se.


*Vi undanbeder oss vänligen men bestämt direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt försäljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.*

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
*Mojang Studios is best known as the creators of Minecraft, but we're also on a mission* *–* *to build a better world through the power of play.*


*Why play? Well, play is at the heart of everything we do. It's the blocky backbone of our games, the core of our development philosophy, and even the origin of our name. From the relentless experimentation of our endlessly inspiring community to the classrooms where Minecraft has become an essential teaching tool, play is the bedrock of our existence.*


As a UX/UI Designer at Mojang Studios, your role is to help millions of players find the fun in Minecraft intuitively and easily. As part of an agile development team, you will focus on improving the usability and accessibility of our user interfaces while preserving the game's significant legacy. We need a designer who excels in communication and collaboration to lead the UX/UI design process, work closely with the team's producer, and manage dependencies. We highly appreciate attention to detail and openness to feedback. Our primary design tool is Figma, used for wireframes, mock-ups, prototypes, and handovers, together with our design system.



You will be part of the wider UX/UI design team, collaborating on projects and ensuring design consistency across Mojang Studios in Stockholm and Redmond. The team meets frequently to share progress, offer and receive feedback, and support one another. We strive for a transparent and inclusive environment that promotes learning and alignment.



We love playing games and believe you have a playful and open mindset with a passion for games and game interfaces. You don't need to identify as a gamer to fit in or perform well here.


**Responsibilities**


* Driving design improvements for one of the world's most popular games
* Designing features and products together with the team and people at Mojang Studios
* Working with our data and analytics team to gather insights and form hypotheses
* Working with usability experts to test your designs and hypotheses
* Working on a wide array of platforms, e.g., Mac/Windows, iPhone, Android, and Xbox including a range of input methods like touch, controller, mouse, etc.
* Creating cohesive, innovative and accessible experiences that follow industry standard patterns and guidelines, and helping/coaching others to do the same across the studio
* Contributing to our design system and ensuring it remains at the forefront of industry standards


**Qualifications**


* Experienced UX/UI Designer, Digital Product Designer, or similar
* Experience with Figma, or similar design tool
* Ability to drive design initiatives from ideas to finished design
* Deep understanding of the design process, including what roles qualitative and quantitative data play in it
* Experience in using design systems
* Ability to work together with developers, designers and other stakeholders
* Fluent in English, written and spoken
* Experience from the game industry is considered a plus, but not required


*Note: Please include a portfolio to the job application*


***About this role:***  

*This is a full-time role based in Stockholm with a hybrid remote working model that requires you to be onsite every week.*

 **Mojang Studios**


*Mojang Studios is a Microsoft-owned game developer. The company was founded in Stockholm, Sweden and has offices around the world, including Stockholm, Redmond, Tokyo, London, and Shanghai. We're always working on new and exciting ways to expand the Minecraft universe.*


*Our community is global and incredibly diverse. We keep this in mind when developing anything, as we want people to feel included in Minecraft. And in recruiting, our goal is to make Mojang Studios as diverse as our community.*


*We got started as a tiny indie developer, and part of our culture still reflects that heritage. But we're also proud to belong to Xbox Game Studios, which creates unique opportunities to grow and develop.*


*To help us achieve amazing things, we have built an equally amazing studio space. Situated right on the water by Söder Mälarstrand, it's filled to the brim with all the tools, toys and caffeine required to create world-class entertainment.*


*But in the end, it's the people of Mojang Studios that make this place truly special. When you join, you'll find yourself in the company of incredibly bright, warm, and creative individuals – all united and working toward a single goal. Come help us reach it!*


***Important note on resumes***  

*Please make sure that* ***all*** *the information in your resume is accurate because we will conduct a thorough background check. Any discrepancies will lower your chances of getting to the next interview stage and we'd hate to miss out on an awesome candidate! Double check that any gap years are reflected in your history, and that your education and work experience are completely accurate. Good luck!*

title: UX Designer in Solna - Temporary position (12 months)
description:
Accounts and payments are the most visited and used pages in our internet banks. The company´s money is among the most important things for the company to keep track of, and it is important that we design well-thought-out and professional pages to support this.  

Our UX Designer working with accounts in large corporates and financial institutions is going on maternity leave and we’re now looking for her substitute during 12 months.  

We are looking for a UX Designer who will join our team, and will help financial teams to have the best overview of the accounts and liquidity. **About the role**
As a UX designer within CX, LC&FI – working with financial accounts, you will have the opportunity to work both strategically and hands-on in development sprints. You will work in close cooperation with other UX designers as well as with product owners, analytics and tech.  

You will be part of our Customer Experience Design community with more than 100 designers. Together we have a high level of skills and competence within user experience and our work is highly valued in the bank’s digitization journey. **To thrive in this role, we believe you have*** You grow from working with others and find it natural to network, both with co-designers and in cross-functional teams
* You enjoy sharing your knowledge, methods and tools
* You will work with prototyping, interaction design and user research in the form of interviews and user testing
* You have at least 1-2 years of experience within UX
* We expect you to have post-secondary education within the field as well as experience in working agile with UX
* You have good language skills in Swedish and English, both written and spoken
* Your goal is to create experiences that customers love!
* If you passionate about creating accessible design, it´s a bonus.

 **What we offer**
We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:* Friendly and welcoming culture
* Opportunities to help transform an industry
* Agile and modern ways of working
* Deliver world-class service to customers

 **Ready to take the next step on your career journey?**
Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.  

Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 4th of December 2024. If you have questions about the position, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner Joakim Isaksson via mail joakim.isaksson@seb.se. **Learn more about working at SEB** www.sebgroup.com/career
It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
company_description: More than 15.000 people work at SEB. Working in SEB means being part of an exciting journey, driven by digital transformation

title: Founding Designer - LegalTech SaaS
description:
### ***Founding Designer - LegalTech SaaS***


### ***Cherry Ventures is supporting our portfolio with this hire***


**Join Qura as Founding Designer**



At Qura (https://www.qura.law/), we're transforming the way legal professionals interact with vast amounts of legal data. We're building AI-powered search engines for legal databases that are currently locked away in outdated digital libraries—unlocking a new era of efficiency and accessibility.


**The Role**



We're looking for our first **Founding Designer** to help define and drive the visual and user experience vision for Qura. As a founding team member, you will:


* **Take ownership of Qura's design vision**, shaping the visual identity across our entire platform, user experience and brand.
* **Translate complex legal data and AI workflows into intuitive designs**. Some of our AI-features have never been done before. Think new. Think big.
* **Tackle ad-hoc design challenges** in a fast-paced environment that values your creativity, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills.
* **Bring 3+ years of experience** in UX/UI design and / or a record of great feats.


**Why Qura?**


* The opportunity to make a significant impact in a fast-growing startup.
* Full ownership and creative freedom to shape the product and brand.
* The chance to be part of the AI revolution in the legal industry.
* Stock options that allow you to share in the success of the company.


**Specifications:**


* **Starting date:** ASAP
* **Location:** Stockholm, Sweden (In-person collaboration in our office in central Stockholm is essential)


**Design philosophy**



Our design philosophy is inspired by Apple, with a focus on achieving a balance between simplicity and sophistication.



We aim for a design that is powerful yet accessible, without committing to any specific color scheme.



We prefer to use visuals that convey our message intuitively, minimizing text to ensure clarity and impact.



TIMELESS



SIMPLE



VISIONARY



If you are driven by innovation and have a passion for creating exceptional user experiences, we'd love to hear from you.

*Cherry Ventures is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, or disability status.*

title: Software Engineer: Web, Azure, DevOps - Sectra Medical Education
description:
Want to innovate and create cutting edge technology to improve patient care by bringing medical education to the next level worldwide?
  
  

At Sectra Medical Education, we want to contribute to proven improved care outcomes for patients by supporting more effective clinical learning and problem-solving abilities of future and current medical professionals. In other words — we create future-proof and effective teaching and learning solutions to increase hospital efficiency and help save lives.
  
  

Sectra Medical Education bridges the gap between learning and clinical practice and brings real clinical tools and data to medical education – making sure advanced diagnostic and visualization tools can be used successfully by tens-of-thousands of medical learners on all levels.
  
  

Working as a Software Engineer at Sectra Medical Education
  
  

Our engineers ensure that Sectra can effectively deliver products that solve the right problems for our end-users. We want our solutions to be perceived as easy-to-use, easy-to-deploy, future-proof and effective, and pride ourselves in truly understanding our customers' environment and needs.
  
  

Our DevOps team is organized into an agile, self-organized group with a shared passion for technology who together are responsible for both the design, implementation, delivery and quality of our products.
  
  

**Join our team and you will:**  

Use C# and .NET, React with TypeScript and MongoDB
  
Work with Azure cloud infrastructure and optimization
  
Make meaningful decisions as a team on a product that is expected to grow quickly in complexity and maturity in the coming years and evolve our way of working – we have a continuous drive to learn and excel
  
Work closely with our customers, users, sales and customer operations colleagues worldwide for fast and continuous feedback during all phases of development.
  
Collaborate with other development teams in Sectra
  
  

Life at Sectra
  
  

We take what we do seriously and prioritize the work ourselves after input from customers and stakeholders at Sectra. However, we like to have fun as well and want and encourage all our employees to explore their own ideas. For example, every six weeks, a two day “RAD Friday” is arranged where all our engineers have the opportunity to work on their own ideas. Ideas that often are incorporated into our products.
  
  

Take this opportunity to also work with different cultures. We have customers in over 60 countries, and an Education team that consists of colleagues from Europe, Americas, Africa and Asia. All members of the DevOps team are based in Linköping.
  
  

Work with great people
  
SOFIA ADOLFSSON
  
UX Designer
  
"There is no sense of prestige at Sectra, no hierarchy. Everyone is listened to regardless of their position."
  
ADAM ALSEGÅRD
  
Software Engineer
  
"I believe Sectra is a great company, with the possibility for personal growth."
  
Skills & Requirements
  
  

At Sectra, we hire for attitude and ability — train for skill. This means who you are is more important than your previous experiences. There are a few core abilities that are central for any role. We always look for your willingness and ability to learn and take on new tasks fast, utilize previous experiences and quickly grasp new information. We also want you to have a strong analytical mindset in which we consider it to be important that you can understand and break down and solve problems. We also want you to be a good communicator where you have the ability to interact with colleagues, partners and customers in an effective, clear and constructive way.
  
  

**In addition to these abilities, we also want you to:**  

Have a Master’s degree within engineering, IT or similar with a strong academic record
  
Have a strong interest in new and innovative technology and software development
  
Be fluent in English both verbally and written
  
Be a strong problem solver in being able to break down and solve complex problems
  
Be a strong communicator
  
Value customer contact and thrive in a fast-paced technological environment
  
  

**We consider it a great asset if you:**  

Have experience with Azure cloud platforms and services and API design
  
Speak more languages than those required above
  
Have interests besides school/work, such as sports, music, horseback riding, singing or flying for example
  
  

**Other information:**  

The goal is for the right candidate to start as soon as possible.
  
  

We recruit on an ongoing basis. This means we encourage you to apply or contact us as soon as possible.
  
  

Depending on the role, a mandatory background security screening might be performed as part of the recruitment process at Sectra. Please reach out to the responsible hiring team if you have any questions regarding this.
  
  

Great Place to Work
  
  

Making a difference
  
  

Great colleagues
  
  

Personal development
  
  

Innovation & technology
  
  

Global environment
  
  

Working close to customers
  
  

About the company
  
  

Sectra develops and sells cutting-edge solutions for medical IT and cybersecurity. We help hospitals and those who are training future healthcare personnel to improve their efficiency so that patients can receive better care. We also support and help defense, authorities, and critical social functions to secure their communication against eavesdropping and protect their systems against unauthorized access. This is how we create conditions for a healthier and safer society.
  
  

One thing that identifies us at Sectra is our customer obsession— our ability and willingness to understand, create value for and stand up for our customers. This shared priority is at the core of our culture. Our customers describe this as having the knowledge to meet expectations, the passion to exceed them. As we hire for attitude and ability - train for skill, we happily expand your knowledge, if you bring the passion and willingness to learn.
  
  

Theresa Lindholm | Contact Person
company_description: The company was founded in 1978, has its head office in Linköping with subsidiaries in 19 countries and operates through partners worldwide.

title: Business Analyst within eHealth
description:
Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in e-health with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our e-health solutions support healthcare professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish health and social care. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.
  
The position
  
As a Business Analyst, you will be a part of an agile development team including developers, testers, architects, product owner and other business analysts. You will together with a solution team investigate and analyze needs, detail requirements, and design solutions for software used in critical care in the Nordic countries. You are an important link between the developers and the customer, with the mission to understand the needs of our end users and translate them into a way that enables the technical teams to build solutions. You often get to follow an initiative all the way from pre-study to development and implementation at the customer's premises. As part of our team, you will do meaningful work where you help to improve and digitize healthcare processes.
  
We are currently looking for Business Analysts who will be working with one of our products used as decision support in the most vulnerable part of the hospitals. You will be working with creating mostly functional requirements but may also need to support non-functional requirements. At Cambio, we encourage taking initiatives that contribute to the development of the company and ourselves. For us, it is important that you should have the opportunity to grow, both as a person and as an employee.Our culture is described through the words “Trust”, “Care” and “Together” which permeateeverything we do.
  
Requirements
  
>3 years of working with business analysis, requirement analysis, product design or similar.
  
Great knowledge in how business needs can be translated into software requirements.
  
* Great ability to collaborate with product owner(s), architects, system developers and UX designers.


Communicates fluently in English in speech and writing.
  
  

It's a bonus if you
  
Experience of health informatics, and/or integration work (e.g. API design).
  
Knowledge of healthcare standards and specifications (FHIR, HL7v2, RIVTA, OpenEHR, SNOMED CT)
  
Previously have worked within healthcare, preferably from ICU or AN
  
Experience in working with agile software development
  
Experience in UX design
  
  

**Place of employment:** Stockholm or Linköping
  
At Cambio we value a healthy work-life balance, and to encourage that we apply a hybrid working-model. Together with your team you decide which days you work at the office. On the remaining days you can work remotely from home, but you are always more than welcome to work at the office too.
  
**Scope:** Full time
  
**Form of employment:** Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
  
**Other:** We screen the applications and hold interviews continuously so please send your application as soon as possible via the link.
  
We encourage and eagerly welcome all applications, but we will only consider candidates who are located and have the legal right to work inSweden.We will ask for verification during the process.
  
We look forward to receiving your application!
  
Read more about us here!
  
Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at the career site here!

title: UX/UI designer
description:
**UX/UI designer**

  

One of our UX/UI designers will be on maternity leave next year and we therefore need a temporary position for her. This position may eventually become a permanent position.


Today, we are a group of designers who work on various products, from small hand-held products to large ride-on vehicles. We work with small and large screens on products, apps on the phone but also websites for various applications. Most of our products are today battery-powered and intended for gardening/forestry.


You will be able to work in all development stages from concept to final release.


You will have the opportunity to work with innovative technologies and concepts.


You will work in close collaboration with our other development teams in Jönköping in app development, industrial design, mechanics, system design, electronics and software. In addition to the teams in Sweden, you will also work directly with our offices and production facilities in the USA and China.


Your main task will be to create UX/UI solutions primarily for our digital solutions from a customer perspective. It is important that you as a person take responsibility and can run projects individually but also in a group.

 **Tasks**

* You have a passion for understanding and enabling user needs, enjoying both the big picture and the fine details of UI design.
* Perform a range of UX and UI tasks on our platforms and deliver intuitive and user-friendly solutions.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to refine user interfaces and improve the overall user experience.
* Map scenarios and personas, help defining epic and user stories alongside Product Owners
* Contribute to the development and adoption of design best practices and methodologies.
* Ensure that works are delivered in accordance with established guidelines and designated construction system.
* Close connection to physical products
* Varied work tasks

**Qualifications**

* Bachelor’s or Master's degree in a relevant field such as human-computer interaction, interaction design, user experience or a related discipline.
* Solid portfolio showing successful design projects across platforms and devices.
* Familiarity with design tools such as Figma and Adobe Creative Suite.
* Strong communication and presentation skills in English.
* An international mind-set with experience working in multi-cultural teams

 ***About the company***

*Globe Technologies, a part of the Globe Group, is a front-runner in a world that leaves fossil fuels and* *electric cords behind. We focus on making battery-powered gardening solutions, empowering the future* *gardener with versatile battery tools that make gardening easier.*

*We have subsidiaries all over the world. All skills, ranging from research and development to production,**exist within Globe Group. We control the entire supply chain, guaranteeing superior efficiency, quality,and ability to meet consumer needs.*

*Currently, we have the following brands Greenworks, Greenworks Commercial and Cramer.*

*Our headquarters are located in China, with production facilities in both China and the USA. We serve the USA and Canada markets through our offices in North Carolina. Our EMEA office is situated in Weiterstadt, Germany, and our main R&D center operates from Jönköping.*

*Our vision is to be one of the leading companies in our industry in the next coming years.*

*To explore some of our products, go to Robotgräsklippare | Cramer (cramertools.com)*

 ***The Application***

*Looks interesting and want to know more or take the step? Send your resume and a short letter**describing where you are, and - more importantly - what drives you and where you are headed, as soon as possible. Selection will be done on an ongoing basis and the position may be filled before the last dayof application.*

*For more questions regarding the position please contact:*

*Thomas Arnell (Hiring Manager),*

*+46 (0) 72-910010*

 ***After you applied***

*We will review all applications continuously, and the position can be filled prior to the expiration date. Ifwe believe you are a potential candidate for the role, you will be invited for an initial interview.*

*In preparation for the interview, you will receive information about the arrangement as well as other* *steps in the process, such as second interviews, assessments, references, and introduction. If you are notchosen to proceed in the process, you will be informed of this at the latest when the position has been filled.*


Type of employment: temporary position | Contract type: full time | Number of positions: 1 | Full-time equivalent: 40 | City: Jönköping | County: Jönköpings län | Country: Sweden | Reference number: 2024/7 | Contact: Thomas Arnell +46702910010, | Published: 2024-11-19 | Last application date: 2025-01-05

title: Technical UI/UX Designer - Games
description:
At Embark, we want to empower everyone to create games!  

  

As a Technical Designer focusing on UI/UX you will be working on our recently announced game ARC Raiders, a third-person PvPvE action game, alongside some of the most talented people in the games industry.  

  

You will have room for creativity while working together with other designers, engineers, artists, and user experience (UX) researchers to improve and develop new features for our game. Here you will have the opportunity to take responsibility for our game’s user interface and player experience.  

  

The game we’re making is built in Unreal, using C++, Blueprint, and a scripting language called Angelscript.  

  

**Example of responsibilities**

* Implement user interface (UI) features in Unreal Engine using a mix of Angelscript and Unreal Blueprint & UMG.
* Collaborate with UX Designers on general guidelines and workflows.
* Collaborate with a wide range of talents at Embark to deliver a great user experience that feels both exciting and easily understood.

**We would love if you have**

* A creative and curious mind!
* A couple of years of experience working within the game industry.
* A good grasp of gameplay and systems design, including player psychology, UX design as well as gameplay mechanics and dynamics.
* Proficiency with the Unreal Engine and experience with scripting and/or Blueprint is a big plus.
* Knowledge of the Unreal Engine-Angelscript plugin is a big plus.
* Knowledge of programming languages such as C#, Lua, Python.
* Professional English communication skills.


At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.  

  

We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.


Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.  

  

Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!  

  

*If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, feel free to apply to us via our "**Open Application.**"*

title: Animation Artist – Bring Characters and Effects to Life!
description:
**About the role**


Are you a talented animator with an eye for effects? Are you looking to take your skills to the next level?

  

We're on the lookout for an animation artist who can help us keep improving our award-winning games. Your job will be to make awesome digital animations for the game's characters, icons, dialogues, UI, and other gaming features. You'll be working closely with our team of Game Designers, Art Directors, and Programmers to create unique and entertaining gaming content. From brainstorming to finishing our games, you'll be involved in the creative process every step of the way.


Join our dynamic team at Just For The Win and help make our games truly unforgettable experiences for players everywhere!

**Who are you?**


We're looking for someone who's a real team player and can work on multiple game projects at once. You've got mad skills when it comes to different art and animation styles and can communicate effectively with your colleagues. Providing top-notch work to various teams is your jam, and you're passionate about being the go-to person for effects and animation within the company. You'll spread the love of animation and special effects throughout the studio and beyond to our customers!

  

We believe that if you have an excellent eye for art and are self-motivated, structured, and creative, working with us will be rewarding!

**Responsibilities**

* Conceptualising and designing high-quality motion graphics and animations
* Proactively plan, develop and oversee timely deliveries of Animation/ Effects Assets
* Designing mockups and storyboards to visualise the project requirements
* Brainstorming unique ideas along with the Game Designer and UI/UX Designer
* Ensuring that the project timelines and requirements are met
* Communicating project timelines and obtaining feedback from clients
* Optimize visual effects/animation for video games and mobile applications
* Troubleshooting any glitches in the project

**Requirements and skills**

* Excellent skills in 2D character/effects animation as well as motion graphics knowledge and skills (portfolio required)
* Experience in drawing and illustration
* Knowledge of Spine, Adobe Creative Suite or similar software.
* Create and animate characters, environments, and effects in different styles.
* Fluent in English
* Must be eligible to work in Sweden

**We value**

  

* + Interest in casino games
	+ Experience with 3D - Maya, Blender or similar
	+ A positive and playful attitude
	+ Experience from working in an Agile/Scrum development
	+ Knowledge of optimization techniques to meet game and memory requirements.
	+ Understanding of the entire game development chain, from game design to the final product

**What we offer**

* Working in a young and growing company
* Opportunity to influence the quality of the products, improve the process and implement your ideas
* 30 paid vacation days per year
* Pension plan
* Professional growth
* Conferences, events and team building
* Freedom with responsibility mindset


All applicants must be eligible to work in Sweden.

*Just For The Win is an award-winning game studio founded in 2016. It employs 50+ creative, professional, and inspirational people in its fields, representing over 15 nationalities. Just For The Win has been awarded the Gasell by Dagens Industri, two years in a row and the Sweden Tech Fast 50 by Deloitte for being one of the fastest-growing companies in Sweden.*

title: Senior System Engineer - Gothenburg
description:

For our client we are looking for a **System Engineer, Gothenburg (SE).**

  

Our client has an exciting opportunity for you to be part of the development of the next generation infotainment system using Google's Android automotive OS.

**Who You Are:**

CANoe, distributed electrical/software systems, Teamcenter, IntegrityTest Analysis, Systemweaver, Requirement Management, Risk Assessment, Automotive system development

Agile

English(Proficient)

20250106 - 20251231

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
*Mojang Studios is best known as the creators of Minecraft, but we’re also on a mission* 
*–* 
*to build a better world through the power of play.*
*Why play? Well, play is at the heart of everything we do. It’s the blocky backbone of our games, the core of our development philosophy, and even the origin of our name. From the relentless experimentation of our endlessly inspiring community to the classrooms where Minecraft has become an essential teaching tool, play is the bedrock of our existence.*
 As a UX/UI Designer at Mojang Studios, your role is to help millions of players find the fun in Minecraft intuitively and easily. As part of an agile development team, you will focus on improving the usability and accessibility of our user interfaces while preserving the game's significant legacy. We need a designer who excels in communication and collaboration to lead the UX/UI design process, work closely with the team’s producer, and manage dependencies. We highly appreciate attention to detail and openness to feedback. Our primary design tool is Figma, used for wireframes, mock-ups, prototypes, and handovers, together with our design system.
   

  

 You will be part of the wider UX/UI design team, collaborating on projects and ensuring design consistency across Mojang Studios in Stockholm and Redmond. The team meets frequently to share progress, offer and receive feedback, and support one another. We strive for a transparent and inclusive environment that promotes learning and alignment.
   

  

 We love playing games and believe you have a playful and open mindset with a passion for games and game interfaces. You don't need to identify as a gamer to fit in or perform well here.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Driving design improvements for one of the world's most popular games
* Designing features and products together with the team and people at Mojang Studios
* Working with our data and analytics team to gather insights and form hypotheses
* Working with usability experts to test your designs and hypotheses
* Working on a wide array of platforms, e.g., Mac/Windows, iPhone, Android, and Xbox including a range of input methods like touch, controller, mouse, etc.
* Creating cohesive, innovative and accessible experiences that follow industry standard patterns and guidelines, and helping/coaching others to do the same across the studio
* Contributing to our design system and ensuring it remains at the forefront of industry standards


**Qualifications**
* Experienced UX/UI Designer, Digital Product Designer, or similar
* Experience with Figma, or similar design tool
* Ability to drive design initiatives from ideas to finished design
* Deep understanding of the design process, including what roles qualitative and quantitative data play in it
* Experience in using design systems
* Ability to work together with developers, designers and other stakeholders
* Fluent in English, written and spoken
* Experience from the game industry is considered a plus, but not required


*Note: Please include a portfolio to the job application*
**About This Role**
*This is a full-time role based in Stockholm with a hybrid remote working model that requires you to be onsite every week.*
**Mojang Studios**
*Mojang Studios is a Microsoft-owned game developer. The company was founded in Stockholm, Sweden and has offices around the world, including Stockholm, Redmond, Tokyo, London, and Shanghai. We’re always working on new and exciting ways to expand the Minecraft universe.*
*Our community is global and incredibly diverse. We keep this in mind when developing anything, as we want people to feel included in Minecraft. And in recruiting, our goal is to make Mojang Studios as diverse as our community.*
*We got started as a tiny indie developer, and part of our culture still reflects that heritage. But we’re also proud to belong to Xbox Game Studios, which creates unique opportunities to grow and develop.*
*To help us achieve amazing things, we have built an equally amazing studio space. Situated right on the water by Söder Mälarstrand, it’s filled to the brim with all the tools, toys and caffeine required to create world-class entertainment.*
*But in the end, it’s the people of Mojang Studios that make this place truly special. When you join, you’ll find yourself in the company of incredibly bright, warm, and creative individuals – all united and working toward a single goal. Come help us reach it!*
***Important note on resumes**
 Please make sure that
 **all** 
 the information in your resume is accurate because we will conduct a thorough background check. Any discrepancies will lower your chances of getting to the next interview stage and we’d hate to miss out on an awesome candidate! Double check that any gap years are reflected in your history, and that your education and work experience are completely accurate. Good luck!*

title: Scrum master (stängd)
description:
Som Scrum Master kommer du tillhöra Team Webb, som utvecklar bl a vår externa webbplats och inloggat läge.
   

  

 I teamet ingår utvecklare, UX-designer, kravanalytiker, testare och Product Owner. Teamet har helhetsansvaret från behov till release. Teamet ansvarar även för att utvecklingsplattformen för webbutveckling förvaltas och uppdateras. Teamet befinner sig i en förändring i arbetssätt och förhållningssätt i att nå nästa nivå av samarbete med gemensamma agila releasetåg enligt SAFe-ramverket. Du kommer coacha teamet genom förändringsledning och arbeta aktivt med teamutveckling.
   

  

 Vi utvecklar och förbättrar ständigt vårt arbetssätt där du kommer vara en viktig spelare som coachar individer, team och organisation. Du arbetar proaktivt tillsammans med teamet för att identifiera och föreslå förbättringar och effektiviseringar, både i våra system och i vårt arbetssätt. Du får ett nätverk av Scrum Masters att samarbeta och utvecklas med.
   

  

 Du behöver ha arbetat som Scrum Master eller teamcoach tidigare och har gedigen erfarenhet av agilt ledarskap och agila metoder. Du har flera års erfarenhet av att coacha agila utvecklingsteam och individer samt kunskap och erfarenhet av förändringsledning och kan hantera motstånd. Du har god kunskap om det agila arbetssättet och kan motivera dess principer genom dina erfarenheter. Du är van att proaktivt stötta både team och individer i team när det gäller tex arbetsbelastning och mående och du är en duktig hinderröjare.
   

  

 Du är informativ och prestigelös, ser till helheten och har lätt för att kommunicera i tal och skrift, både med verksamhet och IT. Du arbetar långsiktigt och vill utveckla människor och team. Som person är du ansvarsfull och du har en förmåga att bygga långsiktiga relationer och skapa engagemang. Vi ser gärna att du har ett stort intresse av att jobba med förbättringsåtgärder för såväl team som i leveransfrågor. Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet inom SAFe.
   

  

**Omfattning:** 
 100%
   

  

**Start:** 
 Omgående
   

  

**Längd:** 
 2024.12.31
   

  

**Ort:** 
 Stockholm, Närvaro på vårt kontor i centrala Stockholm 50% av tiden. Teamet har fasta dagar då de jobbar från kontoret.

title: Product Manager for Apps
description:
**Background**
 For our client in media we are seeking a Product Manager for Mobile Apps to lead an exciting new initiative in the Nordic region, focusing on the development of a cutting-edge mobile app solution while also coordinating our existing applications.
   

  

 This role requires a
 **seasoned product manager** 
 with a
 **solid background in mobile app product management** 
 , user experience (UX) design, and a proven ability to execute cross-functional projects in fast-paced, agile environments.
   

  

 As a full-time role, the Product Manager for Mobile Apps will be responsible for shaping the product vision, prioritizing features, and ensuring our mobile applications deliver a superior user experience while achieving strategic business outcomes.
   

  

**Goal with position**
 The primary goal of this position is to drive the mobile app strategy, enhancing user experience, performance, and feature sets to align with our users’ evolving needs. You will closely collaborate with the app development team and website teams to deliver a cohesive, user-friendly, and high-performing app experience.
   

  

 Additionally, the Product Manager will ensure effective communication of stakeholder priorities, making sure these align with our business objectives and are technically feasible.
   

  

**Core Responsibilities**
* Define and articulate the vision, strategy, and roadmap for our mobile applications.
* Act as the product owner by prioritizing mobile-specific features and translating business objectives into actionable product requirements.
* Collaborate with design and engineering teams to create an intuitive, high-quality, and responsive app experience.
* Maintain high standards for performance, accessibility, and usability in our mobile applications.
* Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to enhance user engagement, retention, and app store ratings.
* Lead cross-functional projects involving engineering, design, marketing, and other product teams to ensure mobile solutions are aligned with overall product goals.


**Additional Responsibilities And Expectations**
* Coordinate with market-specific tech teams and product managers to align app development with existing backlogs.
* Stay updated on industry trends, platform updates (iOS and Android), and best practices in mobile development.
* Present product updates, challenges, and results to stakeholders effectively.
* Work closely with commercial teams to refine user acquisition and retention strategies.


**Background And Experience**
* 5+ years of experience in product management, with at least 2 years dedicated to mobile applications.
* Proficiency in mobile analytics tools and familiarity with key performance metrics.
* Strong understanding of agile methodologies and extensive experience working in agile settings.
* Exceptional communication and collaboration skills, with a focus on delivering user-centric solutions.
* Bilingual in both Swedish and English


**Start:** 
 after agreement with client
   

  

**Scope:** 
 100%
   

  

**Length:** 
 6-12 months
   

  

**Place:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Remote/hybrid:** 
 to be discussed

title: IT Solution Architect – Source to Pay (M/F/D)
description:
**IT Solution Architect – Source to Pay (M/F/D)**

It’s an exciting time to be part of our collaborative inclusive team. Come and join our Global Supply Chain IT team on our journey to improve the well-being of millions. Together we can make a difference!


**About the role:**

Are you an expert in Source to Pay platforms? We're looking for an IT Architect to shape our architectural standards and support our business roadmap. This role offers the chance to make a significant impact by collaborating with Global Procurement and ensuring our IT architecture supports business needs effectively.


We’re looking for people who embody our values, aren’t afraid to challenge, innovate, experiment, and move at a fast pace. We’re always looking for ways to improve our products and ourselves. If this is you, we’d love to talk.


**What you will do:**

* **Design and drive the Global Source to Pay digital roadmap** : Work with business counterparts to support and implement the roadmap, covering processes like Source to Contract, Purchase to Pay, and Invoice processing.
* **Develop and implement IT architecture standards** : Ensure alignment with business requirements and performance goals, consistent with Essity’s IT strategy and roadmap.
* **Lead IT architecture analysis, design, and implementation** : Ensure policies and standards are followed, validate requirements with stakeholders, and obtain buy-in for architecture designs.
* **Collaborate with other architects and stakeholders** : Work with business partners, information architects, enterprise architects, business analysts, and external service providers to ensure solutions and components meet objectives and performance goals.
* **Create and present business cases** : Assess architecture impacts for new or changed solutions, considering aspects like target architecture, strategic fit, cost, security, and value. Present these to stakeholders from both Business and IT.
* **Identify and communicate cross-area issues** : Address any issues that affect other project areas, ensuring integration of all requirements, including functional, security, performance, quality, and operations.
* **Support development of reference architecture** : Develop standards, manage exceptions, and actively seek out new technologies and trends, advocating for change within Essity.

**Who you are:**

* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, management information systems, or related field.
* Over five years of experience in IT development and business analysis, specializing in Source to Pay platforms such as S4/HANA, Ariba, and Invoicetrack.
* Capable of effectively presenting complex technical topics to leadership and architectural boards.
* Fluent in English - **All Applicants are requested to deliver their CV in English language.**

**What we can offer you:**

At Essity, we believe everyone's learning and professional development is unique and want to empower employees to reach their full potential in a winning culture motivated by a powerful purpose.

title: IT- och säkerhetschef
description:
Dematek AB är marknadens mest kompletta leverantör av lyftutrustning, service och säkerhetsutbildningar. Vi finns representerade över hela Sverige och vårt team är vår största tillgång.



Vi är ett framåtblickande företag som strävar efter att ligga i framkant i vår bransch när det gäller digitalisering och teknisk innovation. Vi söker nu en erfaren IT- och säkerhetschef som kan leda vår IT-avdelning och forma vår digitala framtid.


**Om rollen:**



Som IT- och säkerhetschef kommer du att spela en central roll i att förbättra våra befintliga systemstöd och driva digitaliseringsprojekt som optimerar våra processer och ökar vår konkurrenskraft . Du kommer att leda ett mindre team av skickliga IT-medarbetare och säkerställa att våra system är säkra, effektiva och anpassade till våra behov. Vidare kommer du att samarbeta nära med andra avdelningar för att identifiera tekniska lösningar som kan förbättra verksamheten och skapa mervärde för våra kunder.



Du kommer arbeta med företagets säkerhetsskydd innefattande främst informationssäkerhet. Det innebär framtagande av rutiner, kontinuerligt utvärdera hot och risker samt utbildning av personal. Säkerhetsbedömningar av vår egen personal ingår i befattningen.



Befattningen ingår i företagets ledning och rapporterar till VD.


**Arbetsuppgifter:**


* Framtidsäkra, utveckla och implementera IT-strategier som stödjer företagets mål och affärsbehov
* Leda IT-projekt
* Beslutsfattande kring teknikinvesteringar
* Utveckla och genomföra policy och riktlinjer inom IT & säkerhet
* Utföra risk- och sårbarhetsanalyser
* Genomföra interna säkerhetsbedömningar
* Personalansvar


**Vi söker dig som har:**


* Relevant utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
* Nyfiken och proaktiv gentemot IT-utveckling
* Erfarenhet av IT-management
* Kännedom av säkerhetsskyddslagen
* Goda kunskaper i vanliga IT-system och programvara
* Förmåga att kommunicera IT på ett enkelt och förståeligt sätt
* Problemlösande förmåga och en serviceinriktad attityd
* Godkänd säkerhetsklassning är ett krav för denna tjänst


**Vi erbjuder dig:**



Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta i en stimulerande och framåtblickande miljö där du kan påverka och forma företagets framtida IT-strategi. Vi erbjuder dig marknadsmässiga löner, kollektivavtal, generös arbetstidsförkortning, frisk- och hälsoförmåner samt förmåner via Benify såsom friskvårdsbidrag och rabatter hos många företag samt möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling.



Dematek är ett familjeägt företag där vi månar om vår personal samt en stark teamkänsla där vi arbetar tillsammans för att uppnå våra mål. Vi arbetar enligt våra värdeord ÄGARSKAP - HANDLINGSKRAFT - TILLSAMMANS - HÅLLBART.


**Övrigt**



Tjänsten är på heltid. Tjänsten är placerad på vårt huvudkontor i Segeltorp och det finns möjlighet att arbeta på distans upp till två dagar i veckan.


**Ansökan**



Skicka in ansökan med personligt brev och CV på svenska eller snabbansök via LinkedIn. Vi behandlar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdatum.



Läs mer om vårt erbjudande som arbetsgivare på vår karriärsida!



Läs mer om vad vi gör på vår hemsida!

title: Systemförvaltare på IT-enheten
description:
Välkommen till Härryda, en kommun som vågar!
  

  

Här siktar vi mot att ha Sveriges bästa skolor och näringslivsklimat, omsorg av högsta kvalitet och attraktivt samhällsbyggande. Tillsammans är vi 3000 medarbetare som gör mötet med Härryda kommun enkelt. Med mod, nytänkande och handlingskraft inspirerar vi varandra och levererar service med kompetens och kvalitet. Härryda kommun har de fyra senaste åren placerat sig i topp i Dagens Samhälles årliga ranking av Årets superkommun. Du hittar oss mellan Göteborg och Borås med Landvetter flygplats mitt i kommunen.
  

  

IT-enheten i Härryda kommun har som mål att leverera modern innovativ IT med en hög servicenivå till kommunens olika verksamheter. IT-utvecklingen i Härryda kommun är inne i ett expansivt skede som ställer höga krav på en stödjande central IT. För att möta verksamhetens behov rekryterar vi nu en serviceorienterad systemförvaltare till IT-enheten. IT-enheten består idag av 22 medarbetare som arbetar med bland annat projektledning, systemförvaltning, drift, servicedesk och support. Teamet ser fram emot att få träffa dig. Vi är ett gott gäng som alltid räcker ut en hjälpande hand när det behövs.
  

  

Vill du vara en del av ettligt team i en kommun med hög tillväxt och spännande utmaningar, välkommen med din ansökan till Härryda kommun. Tillsammans åstadkommer vi mer!


För mer information: https://www.harryda.se/detharerbjudervidig


**Arbetsuppgifter:**
Din nästa utmaning: Som systemförvaltare på IT-enheten så kommer du att tillsammans med dina fem närmaste kollegor att leverera verksamhetsnytta med fokus på IT-perspektivet. Du kommer att arbeta mot verksamheten och ha ett nära samarbete med deras systemförvaltare verksamhet. Ni tar tillsammans fram förvaltningsplaner och leder förändringsprojekt enligt kommunens systemförvaltningsmodell. Det innebär att du som en del av ett team kommer att få utpekade verksamhetssystem som du ansvarar för ur ett IT och infrastrukturperspektiv.
  

  

I din roll som systemförvaltare IT så kommer du ur ett IT-perspektiv att:
  

* Ta fram förvaltningsplaner tillsammans med systemförvaltare verksamhet och besluta dessa tillsammans med systemägarna för att realisera verksamhetens mål
* Arbeta enligt fastställd förvaltningsplan och prioritera, besluta, planera, genomföra och följa upp aktiviteter inom ramen för förvaltningsplanen
* Beskriva och sammanställa verksamhetens behov samt tolka och översätta dessa till IT-krav kopplat till förvaltningens infrastruktur
* Initiera uppdrag utifrån förvaltningsplanen och projektleda dessa
* Identifiera nya behov tillsammans med systemförvaltare verksamhet
* Genomföra löpande avstämningar med leverantörer
* Planera och samordna systemförändringar. Ex vad som ska utföras samt planera dessa i enlighet med ramverket ITIL och Change
* Dokumentera och ansvara för att systemdokumentationen hålls uppdaterad
* Omvärldsbevaka ur ett IT-perspektiv
* Arbeta i enlighet med kommunens systemförvaltningsmodell som bygger på pm3


  

Vad kan vi erbjuda dig:
  

Härryda kommun lägger stor vikt vid din personliga utveckling. Vi tänker innovation och du kommer att vara en betydelsefull del i att utveckla kommunens IT-miljö, utveckla tjänster och vara delaktig i kommunens framtid tillsammans med dina kollegor. Vi utvecklas mot hybrid-IT, en blandning mellan moln och lokalproducerade tjänster, något som vi ser som en spännande kombination mellan klassisk IT och molnlösningar. Placering i attraktiva Mölnlycke centrum. Vi erbjuder dig att delvis kunna arbeta på distans och ett generöst friskvårdsbidrag.
**Kvalifikationer:**
Vem är du? Vi söker nu dig med minst 3 års erfarenhet av IT-infrastruktur. Du skall ha operativ erfarenhet av konfiguration av Windows server och nätverk då den kunskapen ger dig bra förutsättningar för att både diskutera och planera behov och aktiviteter. Du ska ha en teknisk förståelse för infrastruktur och tekniska samband och hur saker hänger ihop och påverkar varandra. I din ansökan skall du styrka på vilket sätt du har erfarenhet av IT-infrastruktur. Du skall ha relevant högskoleutbildning, ex inom systemvetenskap alternativt arbetslivserfarenhet som arbetsgivaren bedömer som likvärdig.
  

  

Det är meriterande om du har arbetat med systemförvaltning och gärna enligt PM3 i minst 3 år samt har erfarenhet av projektledning för att själv kunna driva mindre förvaltningsprojekt. Du planerar och leder förändringar som verksamheten efterfrågar och till ditt stöd så finns det tekniker som inför planerade förändringarna i kommunens infrastruktur. Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet att arbeta enligt ITIL och att du kan planera förändringar exempelvis genom att skriva change requests.
  

  

Som person är du ödmjuk och förtroendeingivande och du har en vilja att dela med dig av dina kunskaper. Du är lyhörd och ställer upp när det behövs. Du är professionell i ditt arbete, har god samarbetsförmåga och social kompetens och arbetar enkelt med både kollegor och våra verksamheter. Du ska kunna ta egna beslut och leverera med kvalitet.
  

  

Du söker nya utmaningar och utvecklingsmöjligheter och letar efter en spännande och intressant arbetsplats som levererar nytta och mervärde till våra kunder, politiker och kommuninvånare. B-körkort är ett krav för denna tjänst. Du ska behärska både svenska och engelska väl i tal och skrift. I rekryteringen kommer vi att lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga lämplighet.
  

  

När du ansöker får svara på ett antal frågor, vilket innebär att du endast ska fylla i/bifoga ditt CV och inte skicka med personligt brev. Svaren på frågorna används som del i urvalet tillsammans med ditt CV. Ditt CV och svaren på frågorna ska vara formulerade på svenska.
  

För att erhålla anställning ska utdrag ur Polisens belastningsregister uppvisas.

##### **Erfarenhet:**


Ingen erfarenhet krävs


**Övrigt:**
Vi vill upplysa om att din ansökan är en allmän handling enligt offentlighetsprincipen. Om du som sökande har skyddade personuppgifter så skickar du din ansökan i pappersform till: Härryda kommun, Personalfunktionen, Sofia Götberg, 435 80 Mölnlycke
  

  

Din ansökan kommer du att hanteras enligt kommunens rutin för hantering av skyddade personuppgifter vid rekrytering och anställning. Ange annonsens referensnummer i din ansökan så vi vet vilken tjänst du söker.
  

  

Vi ser mångfald som en styrka och välkomnar därför sökande med olika bakgrund.
  

I första hand ser vi att du söker tjänsten via vårt rekryteringssystem.
  

Inför rekryteringsarbetet har vi tagit ställning till rekryteringskanaler och marknadsföring. Vi undanber oss därför bestämt kontakt med mediesäljare, rekryteringssajter och liknande.

**Anställningsform:**
Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning  

Omfattning: Heltid  

Antal platser: 1

 **Ansökan:**

IT-chef

title: Software Engineer
description:
### **Assignment Description**


* Strong hands-on experience in C#, .NET, Web APIs and Microservices.
* Experience working with Microsoft SQL and Cosmos DB.
* Strong hands-on experience in Azure in services such as App Service, Functions, Service Bus, AKS, AAD, AppInsights, Application  

Gateways, Storage accounts etc.
* Strong experience in writing Unit tests, Integration tests with testing frameworks such as MS Test/N-Unit/X-Unit and use of mocking  

frameworks.
* Experience in creating and working with CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps and Infrastructure as Code using Terraform or Bicep.
* Good knowledge of Application and Cloud Security best practices.
* Excellent problem-solving skills.
* Ability to prepare well-designed artifacts.
* Ability to interact with business users for requirement elicitation, clarification, coordination, and explain/walkthrough solutions.
* Good if you have skills in Machine learning.

  


**Responsibilities**


* Design, develop, and implement software solutions that aligns with project goals and meet quality standards.
* Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code using best practices and appropriate software design patterns.
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to gather and analyse requirements for software projects.
* Perform unit testing, debugging, and troubleshooting to ensure software meets functional and performance requirements. Participate in code reviews to provide and receive constructive feedback and improve code quality.
* Collaborate with team members to identify and resolve technical issues and optimize software performance.
* Stay up to date with emerging technologies and industry trends to propose innovative solutions and improvements.
* Contribute to the documentation of software designs, technical specifications, and user manuals.
* Work effectively in an Agile development environment, participating in sprint planning, estimation, and other team activities.

title: It-säkerhetsspecialist inom forensik och threat hunt
description:
Vill du vara med och forma Skatteverkets och dess kundmyndigheters framtida it-säkerhet?


I det här jobbet är du med och utvecklar Skatteverkets tekniska it-säkerhet genom att bedriva och utveckla enhetens förmåga till forensiska utredningar. Du kommer även arbeta med att utveckla enhetens förmåga och kompetens inom threat hunt samt agera verksamhetsstöd som expert.


Vi söker dig som har flera års dokumenterad erfarenhet inom området och en bred teknisk kunskap inom it-säkerhet samt förmåga att leda ett team. Var med och gör samhället möjligt!

**Om jobbet**

  

Som it-säkerhetsspecialist hos oss på tekniskt it-säkerhet säkrar du och dina kollegor Skatteverkets infrastruktur och applikationer genom att bedriva threat hunt och forensiska utredningar av enheter i miljön.


Utöver löpande huvuduppgift inom forensik och threat hunt kommer du också arbeta med drift och underhåll av befintliga säkerhetsprodukter samt att du är med som specialist vid kravställande och införande av nya verktyg och produkter.


Som medarbetare på Skatteverket bidrar du till samhällsutvecklingen och blir involverad i frågor som påverkar många i samhället. Vi arbetar med verktyg och metoder i teknisk framkant. Dina arbetsuppgifter är varierande och utmanande, och eftersom Skatteverket har en stor it-avdelning finns det goda utvecklingsmöjligheter. Du har många kontakter inom myndigheten, med såväl ledning som tekniker och utvecklare.


Du har flexibel arbetstid och det är en självklarhet för oss att du ska ha en balans mellan arbete och fritid. Du är med när vi på Skatteverket fortsätter att stärka vår förmåga inom it-säkerhet, med syfte att bidra till digitaliseringen.


Du tillhör it-säkerhetsenheten på it-avdelningen. Enheten befinner sig i en expansiv utvecklingsfas och består idag av drygt 40 experter inom it-säkerhet. Placeringsort är Östersund.

**Om dig**  

För att göra ett bra jobb och trivas hos oss på Skatteverket behöver du vara lyhörd, tänka nytt och ta ansvar. I arbetet är gott omdöme och förståelse för rättssäkerhet och säkerhet viktigt. Du ska också leva upp till vår medarbetarpolicy.


I det här jobbet ska du:

* kunna leda arbete både inom forensiska utredningar och threat hunt
* driva och utveckla enhetens förmåga inom ditt specialistområde
* vara resultatinriktad med ett högt fokus på kvalité och riktighet i arbetet
* vara pedagogisk och ha hög integritet
* förstå och analysera komplexa frågor och problem
* ha ett strukturerat arbetssätt för att säkerställa noggrannhet och fokuserad på att åstadkomma resultat
* ha mycket god kommunikativ förmåga på svenska i tal och skrift.


Du ska även ha:

* en eftergymnasial utbildning inom it samt flerårig erfarenhet inom arbetsområdet forensik och threat hunt
* erfarenhet av incidenthantering
* flerårig erfarenhet av att arbeta med drift och underhåll av it-infrastruktur.
* erfarenhet att leda ett team


Det är önskvärt att du har dokumenterad utbildning eller genomfört relevanta kurser inom ditt huvudsakliga fokusområde.


Det är även önskvärt med dokumenterad erfarenhet av liknande arbete inom Skatteverket.

**Bra att veta**  

Anställningen är tillsvidare och kan inledas med provanställning i sex månader.


En anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i säkerhetsklass. En säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan därför komma att genomföras före beslut om anställning. För en del av våra arbetsuppgifter i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.


På skatteverket.se/jobb kan du exempelvis läsa om vår samhällsbärande roll, fördelarna med att jobba hos oss och hur det går till när du söker våra jobb.


När du ansöker bifogar du ditt cv. Vi använder inte personligt brev i våra rekryteringar och du ska därför inte bifoga det i din ansökan.


Välkommen med din ansökan!


Skatteverket har en samhällsbärande roll. Vårt arbete berör alla privatpersoner och företag och genom vårt uppdrag bidrar vi till ett väl fungerande samhälle. Vår utveckling är kunddriven och vi samverkar med andra för att skapa effektiva lösningar. Tillsammans gör vi samhället möjligt.


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100 % | Ort: Östersund | Län: Jämtlands län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/444 | Kontakt: Micael Larsson, sektionschef 010-5758294, Åsa Norrbom, hr-specialist asa.norrbom@skatteverket.se, | Facklig företrädare: Jeanette Forsgren, ST jeanette.forsgren@skatteverket.se, Göran Sundwall, Saco goran.sundwall@skatteverket.se, | Publicerat: 2024-11-20 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-11-24

title: Data Engineer
description:
**ABOUT THE ROLE**
At LeoVegas, data is essential to all our decision making needs regarding customer behavior, marketing, social media, product development and discovery of new markets.


The Data Engineering Team is responsible for gathering and processing this information into consumable insights using Big Data technologies. As our Data Engineer you will join a team ofeight data engineers that work with the latest technologies available inside the Google GCP ecosystem.


You will be responsible for elaborating new solutions, implementing and maintaining batch and near real-time ETL pipelines having quality, performance and costs optimization in mind. You will be collaborating with the wider team to optimize data flows, helping business records to integrate and support in the data pipelines.

 **YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:*** Building the ETL pipelines out of complex and high-volume datasets
* Helping business records to integrate and support in the data pipelines
* Integrate, ingest and help improve the data into the Data Warehouse in the Google cloud environment
* Work on adding new features to the system
* Update cloud components

**OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:*** ETL data pipelines development
* Strong knowledge of BigQuery, Dataform is a plus
* Airflow, Dataflow
* Java SE, Python and SQL
* Software engineering practises around test automation, CI/CD, version control
* Knowledge about data modeling, data access, and data storage techniques

**NICE TO HAVE:**

* Knowledge in streaming pipelines / Kafka
* iGaming industry experience

 **WHO WE ARE**

  

At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1800 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 16 offices worldwide.

**BENEFITS*** Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation *(**T&C apply)*
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.

 **JOIN US!**

  

In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!


Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!  

\*\*As our company working language is English, we’d like to see your CV in English, please\*\*

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
**Software: fuel for mobility**
-------------------------------

  

  

We bring bold digital visions to life. So we’re on the lookout for more curious and creative engineers who want to create change – one line of high-quality code at a time. Our transformation isn't for everyone, but if you're excited about solving the leading-edge technological challenges facing the auto industry, then let’s talk about your next move.

  


**Senior Software Engineer**
----------------------------



The Volvo Cars Offer Selector team is seeking a Senior Frontend Engineer with a passion for developing efficient, scalable, and user-friendly interfaces. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of React, NextJS, and server-side rendering. Our application serves millions of customers monthly across 80+ countries around the world. When a customer needs financial options to purchase their vehicle, accessories, service packages or anything else that can be purchased on volvocars.com, that’s where we come in. Help us bring the best possible shopping experience to Volvo customers!


**What you'll do**
------------------


* Develop and maintain highly reliable and scalable web applications using React and NextJS.
* Implement server-side rendering to improve the performance and user experience of our web applications.
* Write comprehensive unit tests and end-to-end tests to ensure the robustness and reliability of the frontend applications.
* Collaborate with the backend team to integrate APIs and services.
* Participate in code reviews to maintain a high-quality codebase.

  




**Leadership Responsibilities**  



* Take ownership of projects from conception to production deployment.
* Communicate effectively with team members, stakeholders, and clients to ensure requirements are met and to discuss any potential challenges.
* Collaborate with various stakeholders, including product managers, designers, and backend engineers, to ensure that the frontend applications align with the company’s goals.

  




**What you'll bring**
---------------------


**Qualifications**


* Proven experience as a Frontend Engineer or Fullstack JavaScript/TypeScript Engineer.
* Proficiency in **React**, **NextJS**, **TypeScript** and **server-side rendering**.
* Experience with frontend testing frameworks and strategies, such as **Playwright** and **Storybook**.
* Strong leadership skills and the ability to take ownership of projects.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, including documentation and sharing knowledge with colleagues.

  




**Bonus Points**


* Familiarity with backend JavaScript frameworks and runtimes, such as **Node.js** and **Bun**.
* Experience with cloud infrastructure in **AWS/Azure** or similar.
* Container orchestration engines, e.g. **Kubernetes**.
* GraphQL.
* Content Distribution Networks, e.g. **Akamai**.
* A passion for vehicles and the car industry!



**Ready to Take the Next Step?**
---------------------------------

  

  

Please submit your application through our career page. Due to GDPR regulations, we’re unable to store or consider applications from other platforms. Make sure to submit your application in English.

  

  

Once your application is successfully submitted, you’ll receive a confirmation email. Applications are open until 20th of December 2024. We’re excited to get to know you!

  



**Volvo Cars – driving change together**
-----------------------------------------

  

  

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse and inclusive working environment. Today, we’re one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, so you can reach your fullest potential.


And it’s so exciting – we’re well on our way on our journey towards full electrification. We have five fully electric cars already on the market, and five more on the way. Our fully-electric and plug-in hybrid cars combined make up almost 50 per cent of our sales. So come and join us in shaping the future of mobility. There’s never been a more rewarding time to play your part in our inspiring and creative teams!
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: IT-tekniker
description:

***Arbetsuppgifter***
---------------------

*Vi söker nu en IT-tekniker till Betalningsområdet på Handelsbanken. Vi erbjuder en varierad roll där du tillsammans med teamet ansvar för ett av bankens mest affärskritiska system.*

***Ditt team***  

*Teamet består av 8 personer fördelade på Team Coach, Produktägare, tekniker och verksamhetsnära resurser. Utöver samarbete inom teamet kommer du jobba i ett agilt leveranståg och med andra teknikområden samt nära affären. Rollen innefattar nära samarbete med teamet, men även med andra utvecklingståg, IT-driftsorganisation och externa leverantörer.*

***Din roll***  

*Du kommer arbeta med installation, konfiguration, support och felsökning av samtliga komponenter som ingår i Swift- och matchningssystemen. Du kommer vara involverad i implementationen av nya funktioner och lösningar, men även livscykelhantering i berörda system.*

***Vi har riktigt bra förmåner***
---------------------------------

* *Tjänstepension*

* *Health promotion subsidy*

***Kvalifikationer***
---------------------

***Din profil***  

*Du är en senior tekniker som jobbat med agilt arbetssätt med inspiration av SAFe. Då vi samarbetar inom hela koncernen behöver du behärska svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift. Du är kompetent inom Windows server o/e RHEL.*

*Det är meriterande om du har arbetat med affärskritiska system med drift dygnet runt, beredskap och inköpta system. Det är stort plus om du har erfarenhet kring MS SQL o/e Oracle DB.*

*Du är en person som tar ägarskap för tekniska frågor från start till mål. Du samarbetar prestigelöst både inom teamet och tar även aktivt kontakt med andra team där det behövs. Som person är du nyfiken och itererar gärna fram förbättringar. Du arbetar strukturerat enligt de processer som finns och anpassar din kommunikation efter mottagaren.*  



***Vi erbjuder***

**Om företaget**
----------------

Hos oss får du ett stort eget ansvar och möjlighet att påverka din egen och bankens framtida utveckling. Våra olika perspektiv, insikter och innovativa idéer utgör en grund för hur vi tillsammans bygger vidare banken för framtiden. För oss är utveckling allt och när du utvecklas, utvecklas banken.

Våra värderingar och starka företagskultur har en avgörande betydelse för vår framgång och guidar oss om hur vi uppnår våra mål, samarbetar och stöttar varandra. Genom stark lokal förankring, ett decentraliserat arbetssätt och ett långsiktigt perspektiv skapar vi hållbara relationer genom livets olika skeenden. Hos oss på Handelsbanken är alla viktiga. Vi kommer från olika platser med olika bakgrund, erfarenhet och utbildning. Tillsammans är vi Handelsbanken.
